title: FS/FT T3 Turkey Red Tenney (NY and Boston)

posts.post_title: FS/FT T3 Turkey Red Tenney (NY and Boston)
posts.post_content:
PSA 3...$850 or will trade for stuff I need (T216's, CJs, M101-2, other interesting stuff)


LMK,

Mac

Great card, Mac, and one of the most difficult variants in the set. Almost as difficult as Rhoades.

Cheers,
Mike
